prompts.appNameTooltip: The name of the module for this application that will be loaded at runtime. This also determines the directory name of the generated application.
prompts.appTitleTooltip: The title of your application that is displayed in the header of the application.
prompts.appNamespaceTooltip: A unique package name for the application module being created. It should follow the standard Java package notation.
prompts.appDescTooltip: Project description in package.json of your project
prompts.appUi5VersionTooltip: Represents the minimum version of SAPUI5 that this application requires.
prompts.appAddDeployConfigToMtaMessage: Add deployment configuration to MTA project ({{-path}})
prompts.appEnableEslintMessage: Add Eslint configuration to the project
prompts.appEnableCodeAssistMessage: Add code assist libraries to your project
prompts.appSkipAnnotationsMessage: Skip generation of associated annotations.cds file
prompts.appEnableTypeScriptWarningMessage: The CAP project will be updated to use NPM workspaces (this is a requirement for generating with TypeScript)

validators.appFolderExistsAtPath: A module with this name already exists in the folder: {{-path}}
validators.folderContainsFioriApp: The project folder path already contains an SAP Fiori application in the folder: {{-path}}. Please choose a different folder and try again.
validators.folderContainsCapApp: The selected project folder is part of an existing CAP project. This application must therefore use the local CAP project as the data source.
